title: Sweet Child 'O Mine
lyrics: SHE'S GOT A SMILE AND IT SEEMS TO ME REMINDS ME OF CHILDHOOD MEMORIES WHEN EVERYTHING WAS AS FRESH AS A BRIGHT BLUE SKY NOW AND THEN WHEN I SEE HER FACE SHE TAKES ME AWAY TO THAT SPECIAL PLACE AND IF I STEARED TOO LONG I'D PROBABLY BREAK DOWN AND CRY WHOA, WHOA - SWEET CHILD OF MINE OH, OH , OH - SWEET LOVE OF MINE  SHE'S GOT EYES OF THE BLUEST SKIES AS IF THEY THOUGHT OF RAIN I HATE TO LOOK INTO HOSE EYES AND SEE AN OUNCE OF PAIN HER HAIR REMINDS ME OF A WARM SAFE PLACE WHERE AS A CHILD I'D HIDE AND PRAY FOR THER THUNDER AND THE RAIN TO QUIETLY PASS ME BY WHOA, WHOA - SWEET CHILD OF MINE OH, OH, OH - SWEET LOVE OF MINE  WHOA, OH, OH , OH - SWEET CHILD OF MINE WHOA OH, OH , OH - SWEET LOVE OF MINE WHOA, OH, OH , OH - SWEET CHILD OF MINE OOH, YEAH-HEH OOH - SWEET LOVE OF MINE (    ) x2 (     ) x2 WHERE DO WE GO? WHERE DO WE GO NOW? WHERE DO WE GO? OOH, WHERE DO WE GO? OOH, WHERE DO WE GO NOW? WHERE DO WE GO? OOH, WHERE DO WE GO NOW? AY, AY, AY, AY - WHERE DO WE GO NOW?......etc
